vlive.korean: 정말 엉망진창이었는데... It was a mess. 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#280. 7979 (w. DJ 정일훈)

examples.korean: The script was good, but those guys butchered it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대본은 좋았는데 그 사람들이 그것을 엉망진창으로 만들어 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: This room’s in a frightful mess. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 방은 정말 엉망진창이군. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Everything was in a thorough mess. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 모든 것이 완전히 엉망진창이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
